nodes.text: Jonny the Sting was a male pit warrior who operated on Nar Shaddaa. He was killed by Boba Fett as part of a mission to kill Wyrmen Lictor.
Jonny the Sting first appeared in War of the Bounty Hunters Alpha 1, a comic book released by Marvel Comics on May 5, 2021.  The issue was written by Charles Soule and illustrated by Steve McNiven.
